project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the structure for questions and answers
Implement the quiz logic to display questions and collect user answers
Calculate the user's score based on their answers
Display the user's final score at the end of the game
Write tests to validate the functionality, including test cases for scoring and answer validation
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure everything functions correctly
